In Uncle Scooby and Antarctica, a friendly penguin invites the Mystery, Inc. crew to visit his polar home, which happens to be haunted by an ice ghost! Then, the gang meets music group Smash Mouth while visiting Australia's Great Barrier Reef to watch Shaggy and Scooby compete in a sand castle contest in Reef Grief! Just when they think it's safe to go back in the water... it isn't.","poster_path":"/zGZLHO4SzfZ2LcfF3CcZ6VWd3c8.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[9648,16,35,10751],"popularity":6.439,"release_date":"2012-03-06","video":true,"vote_average":9.7,"vote_count":51},{"backdrop_path":"/r3plzrSmoefAJlQwbZmeuw3KEFi.jpg","id":396909,"title":"Panda","original_title":"Panda","overview":"Two teenagers are playing by night in a dirty parking lot. In that train, Dejanira, a Brazilian, has a brush with the two ticket inspectors. Mimi, another traveler and also a lawyer, helps her. The four of them will meet together later and live a few shifted adventures with a strange-speaking sailor (Mimi's client).","poster_path":"/ysJ9rRGAl8L7lsyzzNYybki4U2V.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":5.953,"release_date":"1986-04-16","video":false,"vote_average":5.769,"vote_count":54},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":923226,"title":"People","original_title":"People","overview":"People is a film shot behind closed doors in a workshop/house on the outskirts of Paris and features a dozen characters. It is based on an interweaving of scenes of moaning and sex. The house is the characters' common space, but the question of ownership is distended, they don't all inhabit it in the same way. As the sequences progress, we don't find the same characters but the same interdependent relationships. Through the alternation between lament and sexuality, physical and verbal communication are put on the same level. The film then deconstructs, through its repetitive structure, our relational myths.","poster_path":"/u6d3bVEVqT949RW9x9zuaapWxkW.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":2.251,"release_date":"2021-06-21","video":false,"vote_average":7.8,"vote_count":6},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":988355,"title":"Red","original_title":"Red","overview":"","poster_path":null,"media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"pt","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":1.916,"release_date":"2003-10-12","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":16},{"backdrop_path":"/1RwWclnfcAcFG5n1qejtKRQDqE3.jpg","id":76535,"title":"Marvel One-Shot: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Thor's Hammer","original_title":"Marvel One-Shot: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Thor's Hammer","overview":"Agent Coulson stops at a convenience store and deals with a coincidental robbery during his visit.","poster_path":"/njrOqsmFH4pxBrhcoslqLfw2OGk.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[878,14],"popularity":18.705,"release_date":"2011-10-25","video":false,"vote_average":6.8,"vote_count":446},{"backdrop_path":"/dWY0un8uXrQ366sS39pM0G602Uw.jpg","id":140652,"title":"My Super Psycho Sweet 16: Part 3","original_title":"My Super Psycho Sweet 16: Part 3","overview":"As she leaves for art school in New York, Skye gets a phone call from Alex. Unfortunately, someone else has the same idea, and they're stalking and slashing their way through Alex's Sweet 16 party at her grandparents' isolated estate.","poster_path":"/1ozicpshkAqNTXsug8qVh3adjj.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[27,10770,18,35,9648],"popularity":5.237,"release_date":"2012-03-13","video":false,"vote_average":5.7,"vote_count":25},{"backdrop_path":"/pyw45YPB9Mk01zQiAnvfIdUFYQo.jpg","id":911972,"title":"Devil In Dune","original_title":"沙丘虫暴","overview":"The film tells the story of a near future in which the earth is irreversibly sandy, as human emissions and rubbish exceed its carrying capacity. An exiled team of wealthy businessmen, scientists, security chiefs, mechanic families and gangsters set out on an adventure to find the Oasis in a special armoured vehicle, but the bloodthirsty insects are hot on their heels.","poster_path":"/nQLdzYYB71sUugtSR7e7YdjF6Vx.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"zh","genre_ids":[878,28],"popularity":9.221,"release_date":"2021-12-03","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":17},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":379726,"title":"Travelling Hawkers in Frankfurt am Main","original_title":"Fliegende Händler in Frankfurt am Main","overview":"A documentary about unemployed people who bought fruit and vegetables at moderate prices at the wholesale market and sold these in the streets of Frankfurt. Filming lasted a whole year.
